mapper.select: SELECT p.productCode, p.productName, p.productPrice, p.storedType, COALESCE(wms.MinStock - COALESCE(SUM(inv.quantity), 0), 1000) as suggestedQuantity FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Inventory inv ON p.productCode = inv.productCode AND inv.warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode} INNER JOIN WarehouseMinStock wms ON p.productCode = wms.productCode AND wms.warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode} GROUP BY p.productCode, p.productName, p.productPrice, p.storedType, wms.MinStock HAVING SUM(inv.quantity) < wms.MinStock ORDER BY p.productCode
